items.title: All Steps | Tesseract OCR Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for Tesseract OCR Connector. Easily include Tesseract OCR in your forensic and ediscovery Sequence automation workflows.

items.title: GetImageFormat Step | Tesseract OCR Connector Documentation
items.description: Gets the image format implied by the file extension of the file name. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: TesseractOCR Step | Tesseract OCR Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns true if the file in the specified path exists, false otherwise. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.
